mapper.select: SELECT "map_idx", "game_idx", "map_title", DBMS_LOB.SUBSTR("map_desc", 4000, 1) AS "map_desc", "map_theme", "created_at" FROM "maps" WHERE NOT EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM "stages" LEFT JOIN "game_clear" ON "stages"."stage_idx" = "game_clear"."stage_idx" AND "email" = #{email} WHERE "maps"."map_idx" = "stages"."map_idx" AND ("game_clear"."stage_idx" IS NULL OR "game_clear"."success_yn" != 'Y') )

SELECT "maps"."map_idx", ( SELECT COUNT(*) FROM "stages" "s" LEFT JOIN "game_clear" "gc" ON "s"."stage_idx" = "gc"."stage_idx" AND "gc"."email" = #{param2} AND "gc"."success_yn" = 'Y' WHERE "s"."map_idx" = "maps"."map_idx" ) as "cleared_stages_count", ( SELECT COUNT(*) FROM "stages" "s2" WHERE "s2"."map_idx" = "maps"."map_idx" ) as "total_stages_count", ( SELECT "map_idx" FROM "maps" WHERE "map_idx" = #{param1} + 1 ) as "next_map_idx" FROM "maps" WHERE "maps"."map_idx" = #{param1}
